remarks: Betweenness implies colinearity (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Mar-2019.)
statement:
btwnlng1.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
btwnlng1.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
btwnlng1.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
btwnlng1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
btwnlng1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
btwnlng1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
btwnlng1.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) $.
btwnlng1.d $e |- ( ph -> X =/= Y ) $.
btwnlng1.1 $e |- ( ph -> Z e. ( X I Y ) ) $.
btwnlng1 $p |- ( ph -> Z e. ( X L Y ) ) $.
